des: "This chip/cracker dip is always the first thing to disappear at any party that I take it to. It's equally delicious with shrimp or crab."
ins: In a medium-sized mixing bowl, combine sour cream, cream cheese, mayonnaise, Worcestershire sauce, parsley, onion salt, celery salt and garlic salt. Mix well. Fold in drained shrimp meat. Cover and chill at least 4 hours, to allow flavors to blend.
